attributes.action: ensure the NHS doesn't become a free International Health Service
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Failed asylum seekers have been given free healthcare treatment in Wales. 

This is unfair for the taxpayer, and for people on lengthy waiting lists waiting for treatment.

Failed asylum seekers should pay the full fee, or obtain private medical insurance, or seek help from a registered charity to cover their medical costs.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
